channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0158; 04:57AM; 291 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ucjLqe; #HighlandPark; Firefighters found a slow-moving brush fire in steep terrain, with very light wind. Crews surrounded the burning vegetation with hose lines and fire breaks (created with hand tools) and contained the fire to approximately 1.5 acres. It took 52 firefighters 94 minutes to extinguish the flames. No injuries. No structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP47 E1 E12 E16 E201 E212 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 SO1 T1 T12 T90; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0158; 03:23AM; 291 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ucjLqe; #HighlandPark; Approximately one-half-acre of brush burning on a hill in or near Debs Park. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 T1 T12 T90; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1018; 02:42PM; 1379 N Miller Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FFcKGH; #HollywoodHillsWest; Firefighters from LAFD and LA County FD both responded to the brush fire burning on a steep slope between several homes. Crews made a strong stand, to hold the fire to less than one-half of an acre, and protected ALL neighboring homes. Crews will remain in the area to fortify containment lines and eliminate any remaining hot spots or smoldering debris. Approximately 48 LAFD firefighters, along with LA County FD personnel, took approximately 80 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 BP44 CM40 CM42 E261 E27 E290 E292 E41 E58 E61 E71 E97 EA1 EM9 H1 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 HA7 PI2 RA61 RA97 T61 T90; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1018; 01:22PM; 8635 W Metz Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40nPFl6; #HollywoodHillsWest; LAFD (City) and LA County FD are responding to an approximately one-half-acre vegetation fire, with nearby structures threatened. Firefighters have positioned themselves for structure protection with hose lines, while other crews work to anchor, flank, and pinch (systematically surround the fire and stop forward progress).; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E261 E27 E290 E292 E41 E58 E61 E71 E97 EM9 H1 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 HA7 T61 T90; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCkDOWn Structure Fire; INC#0185; 03:54AM; 12408 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QGBPXO; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. A primary and secondary search of the interior was clear. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA889 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0185; 03:28AM; 12408 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QGBPXO; Valley Glen; Split level four-plex with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA889 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped 10/31/2023 INC#1899

item.description: Update Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped; INC#1899; 11:16PM; 100 N Temescal Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qnjais; Pacific Palisades; All forward progress is stopped and there are currently no structures threatened. No injuries reported. Firefighters will continue to encircle and fully extinguish the flames then proceed into an overhaul operation to mop up any remaining hot spots. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC17 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E23 E237 E263 E269 E290 E292 E58 E59 E62 E63 E69 E71 E94 EM9 H0A H0D H1 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 HA7 RA23 T37 T63 T69 T90 T92 WT88; CH5; 15; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1899; 10:45PM; 100 N Temescal Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Qnjais; Pacific Palisades; Approximately 1/4 acre of light to medium brush with no wind (topography driven). There is potential for structures to be threatened in the Pacific Palisades Bowl Mobile Estates (Samoa Way) however firefighters are making good progress and there are no evacuations in place at this time. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC17 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E23 E237 E263 E269 E290 E292 E58 E59 E62 E63 E69 E71 E94 EM9 H0A H0D H1 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 HA7 RA23 T37 T63 T69 T90 T92 WT88; CH5; 15; Margaret Stewart

Vehicle Into Building; INC#1783; 09:28PM; 1657 N La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MrnvA1; Hollywood; Three vehicle collision with the front end of one vehicle (pick up truck) into the front of a small commercial building (reported as a pizza place). There was no extrication required. One patient (32yo M) is being transported in unknown condition. There is probable compromise of the structural integrity of the front of the restaurant and LAFD Urban Search and Rescue resources are enroute to evaluation and stabilize the building as required. LA Dept of Building and Safety is responding and will make the determination on the condition of the building for occupancy. Questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 4125. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 9:04PM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E205 E227 E61 E76 E82 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA52 RA61 RA76 RA82 RA835 T27 T5 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1263; 04:43PM; 5 Mustang Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/45SBRAw; outside city; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 34 minutes. The three occupants (including two elderly female patients) were evaluated and did not require any medical treatment. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 E105 E106 E296 E305 E472 RA104 RA106 RA72 T105 T96; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart
